EmailTemplate.name: FlightPlan_Online_Event_for_Airlines_by_Inmarsat_and_APEX.Q4 Event - Save date
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow | Join FlightPlan: Strategies for Recovery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ${headertext} ${ctaLinkText} <[[${ctaLink}]]> Cleaner Air for Passengers
Rebecca Sidelinger, President, Mechanical Systems and Components, will discuss Honeywell's offerings that focus on cleaner air in the cabin. Rebecca is part of the discussion on innovations that help build passenger confidence .
Session start: 15:40 PM GMT Technologies That Drive Airline Recovery
Josh Melin, Honeywell Forge Leader, will talk about "Green Recover." Josh will focus on how 2020 has changed airline priorities and how new technologies help airlines improve operations and the customer experience.
Session start: 16:40 PM GM
